description: Distribution of Coastal tourism values in the NMC region layer/data shows the distribution of  Coastal tourism value and benefits accrued annually from primary utilisation of the ocean.  Coastal tourism value data was derived from the study "Understanding and Valuing the Marine Ecosystem Services of the Northern Mozambique Channel " by Paulo A.L.D. Nunes and Andrea Ghermandi. This study aimed to understand and value the coastal and marine ecosystem services in the Northern Mozambique Channel region (NMC).
name: Distribution of coastal tourism values in the NMC region
